extensionName.message: Adblock ho an'ny YouTube™ — best adblocker

extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: Mahalala ny tsiambaratelo, Adblock azo antoka ho an'ny YouTube ™. Sakana ny doka ao amin'ny YouTube.com.

timesaveInfo.message: Adblock for Youtube™ voatahiry eo ho eo. $savedTime$ amin'ny androm-piainanao.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

displayVideoBranding.message: Asehoy eo ambany vidéo ny fampahafantarana fanitarana

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Asehoy ao anaty badge ny fangatahana voasakana
